class_notes: Music Majors: counts as a general elective credit
course_description:
Student composers and performers learn techniques and practices of
improvisation and study stylistically and culturally diverse perspectives on improvisation to develop listening, performing, and composing skills. We will form a band and rehearse during class at least once per week.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in BRB Performing Arts Studio
